name: Falling 'form
description:
Made by Ne0Jiku and Apocourt.

You are in a dungeon. The ground is fragile and falls as you walk on it. Be careful with the platform, and don't fall, to try to stay the last one standing.

Left = Left arrow

right = Right Arrow

up = Up Arrow

Down = Down Arrow

Game design = Apocourt

Programming = Ne0Jiku
